# Vedic Astrology Website - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
A comprehensive Vedic astrology (Kundli) website with Next.js 15+, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

## Progress Checklist

- [x] Setup API integration (Mock API)
- [x] Build Kundli Matching page

- [x] Add more UI polish and animations
- [x] Implement real API integration
- [x] Add authentication
- [x] Add PDF generation
- [x] Add Jyoti AI Chatbot

## Tech Stack
- Framework: Next.js 15.5.9 (App Router with Turbopack)
- Language: TypeScript (strict mode)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- Animations: Framer Motion
- State: Zustand (with persist middleware)
- Forms: React Hook Form + Zod
- Charts: Recharts
- Icons: Lucide React
- AI: Anthropic Claude / OpenAI GPT (optional)
- Markdown: react-markdown

## Jyoti AI Chatbot Features
- Floating widget button (bottom-right corner)
- Expandable chat window with cosmic theme
- Real-time typing indicator
- Markdown support in responses
- Voice input button (placeholder)
- Interactive breathing meditation exercise
- Crisis support card with Indian helplines (AASRA, Vandrevala, iCall)
- Intelligent fallback responses for astrology queries
- Chat history persisted in localStorage
- Quick action suggestions
